mash_a.description: Presses the 'A' button 8 times in a row. Useful for quickly advancing dialogue or spamming the first attack in battles.
mash_a.python_script:
import json
print(json.dumps(["A" for _ in range(8)]))

patrol_grass.description: Moves the player Left and Right to search for wild Pokemon, and presses A to handle battle introductions.
